CustomField.description: The parent Agent Capability that this node belongs to. This capability must have its 'Implementation Type' set to 'Graph'. This relationship groups all nodes that form a single, cohesive process.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select the "Graph" type Agent Capability that this step is a part of. For example, if you are defining the steps for an "Onboard New Client" process, you would select the 'onboard_new_client' capability here.
CustomField.label: Agent Capability
